text:
ya A$tmaqdA ba#laqdA yasyaq viSva# uqpAsa#tE praqSiShaqM ~Myasya# dEqvAH | 
yasya# CAqyA&mRutaqM ~Myasya# mRuqtyuH kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma ||
uqpaqyAqmagRu#hItO&si praqjApa#tayE tvAq juShTa#M gRuhNAmiq tasya# tE pRuthiqvI ma#hiqmauSha#dhayOq vanaqspata#yO rUqpamaqgnistEq tEjaqstasmai$ tvA mahiqmnE praqjApa#tayEq svAhA$ || 43 
(ya A$tmaqdAH pRu#thiqvya#gni-rEkAqnnaca#tvAriq(gm)qSat) (A17)
